name: GeekyGuy
0:
”Alexa, open Geeky Guy”
”Give me a tip for life”
”Play a tip for sleep”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: geeky guy
des:
Why not start a day with short tips that can raise the motivation, give you an idea for the area that you’re interested and much more.
Instead of searching on the Internet for any tip, you need, browsing and exploring for the best out content, just ask the Geeky Guy for it and enjoy the content.
The skill gives the curious people new insights and openness to grow the knowledge base out of the box. Hearing the tips presented by Alexa will take you to the next level best of you, unlocking powers within you that have never been explored heretofore.
The interaction with the skill is clear and concise, ask for tips in the area of interest, let Alexa gives you the best out there, and apply it in the real life. The point is to get wise tips and get out much of them without distractions.

Topics that Geeky knows about:

- Life
- Sleep
- Motivation
- Money
- Beauty

Ask Geeky with the following phrases:

- Read aloud a tip for <topic>
- Start a tip for <topic>
- I want a tip for <topic>
- Play a tip for <topic>
- Launch a tip for <topic>

Examples: 

1. I want a tip for motivation.
2. Play a tip for money.

DISCLAIMER: 

Geeky Guy is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure, or prevent any disease or medical condition. 

SUPPORT:

We'd love to hear from you! If you have questions, comments, or feedback, please leave them as a review.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
